page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = DropDatabase(database as C)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The DropDatabase() method removes a database.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection if .not. conn.open("{A5API=Access, FileName='C:\Databases\Northwind\northwind.mdb', UserName='Admin'}") then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.DropDatabase("Northwinds") then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if
